creator: MBCode
descriptionHtml:
Practice conjugating verb tenses with this Spanish verb trainer. There are two quiz types: Fill in the blank and multiple choice.

The app tests the five tenses of the indicative mood. A point system is used to unlock tenses. Begin testing in the present tense. Unlock the past tense with 10 points, imperfect with 25 points, future with 50, and conditional with 100 points. A point is scored for each correct "fill in the blank" answer made without hints or mistakes.

The app has the option to include or exclude the vosotros form in your quiz.
descriptionShort: Spanish Verb Conjugation Quiz

title: ConjuGator - Spanish Verbs

creator: MBCode
descriptionHtml:
Practice conjugating verb tenses with this Free Spanish Verb Quiz. Test your proficiency on the Indicative, Imperative and Subjunctive tenses of 1000+ verbs. Choose between two quiz types: Multiple Choice for beginners, or our more challenging Fill in the Blank quiz.

Highlights:

● 1000+ Verbs

● Multiple Choice and Fill in the Blank quizzes.

● Test on all 1000+ verbs or only select verbs with our Verb Lists:

-- 100 Most Commonly Used Verbs
-- Regular 'ar' Verbs
-- Regular 'er' Verbs
-- Regular 'ir' Verbs
-- and more lists

● Hint button if you need help to correctly conjugate the verb.

● Your score is kept visually with chili peppers for correct answers and tomatoes for wrong answers.

● Review the correct conjugations to wrong answers after every ten questions.

● Review conjugations of each verb in the handy reference section.

● Include or exclude the Vosotros conjugation from your quiz.

● Internet access is not required.

● Our mascot 'Conju' the Gator cheers on your correct answers!

All features of the app are free to play, but some features are initially locked. Features are unlocked as you gain app points. A point is gained for each verb you correctly conjugate in the multiple point quiz. Below are the app tenses and the verb lists available in the app, and the points needed to unlock them.

Points ---- Tense
0 ------- Present Indicative
0 ------- Future Indicative
0 ------- Preterite Indicative
25 ----- Imperfect Indicative
75 ----- Conditional Indicative
100 --- Imperative Affirmative
150 --- Present Subjunctive
200 --- Future Subjunctive
250 -- Imperfect Subjunctive

Points ---- Verb Lists
0 ------ Top 100 Verbs
0 ------ Regular 'ar' Verbs
0 ------ Regular 'er' Verbs
0 ------ Regular 'ir' Verbs
50 ----- 500 Common Verbs
125 --- 25 Irregular Verbs
225 ---- 50 Essential Verbs

Sign in with your Google or email account to save your points, and use them across your devices and on our web app.
